nodes.text: The secondary royal palace was a residence maintained on the moon Onoam for the Monarch of Naboo. A spaceport stood a few kilometers away. The palace had a throne room with a high golden throne; Queen Dalné greeted Princess Leia Organa there when Organa arrived on Onoam. Prior to visiting Imperial Moff Quarsh Panaka in his chalet, the two returned to the palace to change clothes after they had visited a mine underneath the moon's surface.
